00001 // ************************************
00002 // TIMER AND WAIT FUNCTIONS AND DEFINES
00003 // ************************************
00004 #ifndef TIMER_H
00005 #define TIMER_H
00006 
00007 //*****************************************************************************
00008 //
00009 // If building with a C++ compiler, make all of the definitions in this header
00010 // have a C binding.
00011 //
00012 //*****************************************************************************
00013 #ifdef __cplusplus
00014 extern "C"
00015 {
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 // Summary:     waits a specified amount of time
00019 // Parameters:
00020 //              ms: the number of milliseconds to wait
00021 // Note:        Uses TIMER1. If you use Wait() or WaitUS(), you should not use TIMER1 elsewhere in your code;
00022 //                      If you use TIMER1 in your code, you should not use Wait() or WaitUS()
00023 extern void Wait(unsigned long ms);
00024 
00025 // Summary:     waits a specified amount of time
00026 // Parameters:
00027 //              ms: the number of microseconds to wait
00028 // Note:        Uses TIMER1. If you use Wait() or WaitUS(), you should not use TIMER1 elsewhere in your code;
00029 //                      If you use TIMER1 in your code, you should not use Wait() or WaitUS()
00030 extern void WaitUS(unsigned long us);
00031 
00032 //*****************************************************************************
00033 //
00034 // Mark the end of the C bindings section for C++ compilers.
00035 //
00036 //*****************************************************************************
00037 #ifdef __cplusplus
00038 }
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #endif // TIMER_H
